description:
CompoundManager.closeLoan(address,bytes32) (modules/CompoundManager.sol#125-146) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 (modules/CompoundManager.sol#140)

CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(address,address,address) (modules/CompoundManager.sol#433-439) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 && debt == 0 (modules/CompoundManager.sol#436)
markdown:
[CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(address,address,address)](contracts/modules/CompoundManager.sol#L433-L439) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [collateral == 0 && debt == 0](contracts/modules/CompoundManager.sol#L436)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[_wallet].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery)

description:
RecoveryManager.notWhenRecovery(address) (modules/RecoveryManager.sol#79-82) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[_wallet].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery) (modules/RecoveryManager.sol#80)
markdown:
[RecoveryManager.notWhenRecovery(address)](contracts/modules/RecoveryManager.sol#L79-L82) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[_wallet].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery)](contracts/modules/RecoveryManager.sol#L80)

description:
Reentrancy in MakerV2Loan.giveVault(address,bytes32) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#333-344):
	External calls:
	- cdpManager.give(uint256(_loanId),msg.sender) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#342)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- clearLoanOwner(_wallet,_loanId) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#343)
		- delete loanIds[_wallet][cdpManager.ilks(uint256(_loanId))] (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#368)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [MakerV2Loan.giveVault(address,bytes32)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L333-L344):
	External calls:
	- [cdpManager.give(uint256(_loanId),msg.sender)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L342)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [clearLoanOwner(_wallet,_loanId)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L343)
		- [delete loanIds[_wallet][cdpManager.ilks(uint256(_loanId))]](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L368)

description:
Reentrancy in MakerV2Loan.openVault(address,address,uint256,uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#521-549):
	External calls:
	- _cdpId = cdpManager.open(ilk,address(this)) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#539)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- loanIds[_wallet][ilk] = bytes32(_cdpId) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#541)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [MakerV2Loan.openVault(address,address,uint256,uint256)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L521-L549):
	External calls:
	- [_cdpId = cdpManager.open(ilk,address(this))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L539)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [loanIds[_wallet][ilk] = bytes32(_cdpId)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L541)

description: MakerV2Loan.joinCollateral(address,uint256,uint256,bytes32) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#400-425) ignores return value by collateral.approve(address(gemJoin),_collateralAmount) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#422)
MakerV2Loan.joinDebt(address,uint256,uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#427-441) ignores return value by daiToken.approve(address(daiJoin),_debtAmount) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#437)

	- ArgentENSResolver.setAddr(bytes32,address) (infrastructure/ens/ArgentENSResolver.sol#49-52)

name(bytes32) should be declared external:
	- ArgentENSResolver.name(bytes32) (infrastructure/ens/ArgentENSResolver.sol#78-80)
	- ENSResolver.name(bytes32) (infrastructure/ens/ENSResolver.sol#27)

LegacyBaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes) (legacy/LegacyBaseWallet.sol#127-132) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (success) = _target.call.value(_value)(_data) (legacy/LegacyBaseWallet.sol#129)
markdown:
[LegacyBaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes)](contracts/legacy/LegacyBaseWallet.sol#L127-L132) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [(success) = _target.call.value(_value)(_data)](contracts/legacy/LegacyBaseWallet.sol#L129)

[BaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes)](contracts/wallet/BaseWallet.sol#L120-L132) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:

description:
MakerV2Loan.debt(uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#472-488) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_fullRepayment = art.mul(rate).div(RAY).add(1).add(art - art.mul(rate).div(RAY).mul(RAY).div(rate)) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#484-486)
markdown:
[MakerV2Loan.debt(uint256)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L472-L488) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[_fullRepayment = art.mul(rate).div(RAY).add(1).add(art - art.mul(rate).div(RAY).mul(RAY).div(rate))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L484-L486)

description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Proxy (wallet/Proxy.sol#24-51) has payable functions:
	 - Proxy.fallback() (wallet/Proxy.sol#34-50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Proxy](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L24-L51) has payable functions:
	 - [Proxy.fallback()](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L34-L50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
